name: Pending Invoices
query: select tabInvoices.name as 'Invoice Number',tabInvoices.guest_name as 'Guest Name',tabInvoices.confirmation_number as 'Confirmation No.',tabInvoices.gst_number as 'GST No.',tabInvoices.room_number as 'Room No.',tabInvoices.invoice_type as 'Invoice Type',tabInvoices.has_credit_items as 'Credit Notes',tabInvoices.irn_generated as 'IRN Generated',tabInvoices.invoice_date as 'Date',DATEDIFF(CURDATE(),DATE(tabInvoices.creation)) as "No of days" from tabInvoices where tabInvoices.irn_generated = "Pending" and (DATE(tabInvoices.creation) between %(from_date)s and %(to_date)s) order by tabInvoices.name, tabInvoices.room_number
